糤字的基本解释

糤
sǎn
古同“馓”。

糤字的汉语字典释义

[①]［sǎn］
［《廣韻》蘇旱切，上旱，心。］
亦作“糤1”。“馓1”的繁体字。
(1)馓饭。糯米煮后煎干制成。
(2)馓子。

糤字的康熙字典解释

【未集上】【米字部】　糤； 康熙笔画：18； 页码：页912第42
【廣韻】蘇旱切【集韻】顙旱切，?音繖。熬稻粻䊗也。與饊同。

糤字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体韩国明朝体
糤字的起名意思

暂无。

Glutinous rice
Basic explanation of words
Glutinous rice
sǎn
Gu Tong "Fu".
Glutinous rice
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［sǎn］
["Guangyun" Su drought cuts, drought, heart. ]
Also known as "糤1". Traditional characters for "馓1".
(1) Steamed rice. The glutinous rice is cooked and fried.
(2) Fuzi.
Glutinous rice
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Uncollected First] [Mi Zi Department] 　糤; Kangxi Strokes: 18; Page Number: Page 912 No. 42
[Guang Yun] Su Han cut [Ji Yun] Dry cut,? Sound umbrella. Also boil rice glutinous rice. Same as 饊.
